item.title: Never Give Up Until You Exhaust Every Option

item.title: Boring Advice Repository - LessWrong
item.description: Boring Advice Repository - LessWrong Some Highlights When in need of a conversation topic, ask a question about the other person’s life.

item.title: Guide to Salary Negotiation
item.description: Guide to Salary Negotiation From the Kalzumeus Software article: Your model is broken Virtually any amount of money available to you personally is mouse droppings to your prospective employer.

item.title: Start Negotiating When You Reach Yes-If, Not No-But
item.description: Start Negotiating When You Reach Yes-If, Not No-But (Yes-If we agree on terms.) Do not start negotiating from No-But. (No-But we might hire you anyway if you’re really, really effing cheap.

item.title: Mirroring
item.description: Mirroring It seems like…

item.title: "You've Been Very Generous. It Sounds Like There's Nothing More You Can do."
item.description: “You’ve Been Very Generous. It Sounds Like There’s Nothing More You Can do.” This is a powerful phrase that simultaneously compliments and encourages someone to do more!

item.title: Accusations Audit
item.description: aliases: You’re Going to Think…, You’re Gonna Think… Accusations Audit Accusation audit allows the other person to get something off their chest.

item.title: Ask How Their Day Was at the End, Not the Beginning
item.description: Ask How Their Day Was at the End, Not the Beginning Related To: [[Peak-End Rule]], , Ask for the information. Then, how was your day?

item.title: Don't Use We When You Mean You. They Will Appreciate the Honesty
item.description: Don’t Use We When You Mean You. They Will Appreciate the Honesty References (References:: [[Chris Voss]]) Chris Voss

item.title: Getting to No
item.description: aliases: No-Oriented Questions Getting to No

item.title: How to Ask for a Better Hotel Room
item.description: How to Ask for a Better Hotel Room [[Never Split the Difference]] References (References:: https://youtu.be/pd7tjnVYMzY?t=3596)

item.title: How to Control Your Emotions
item.description: How to Control Your Emotions Always be prepared for the worst. [[The Most Dangerous Punch is the One You Don’t See Coming]]

item.title: How to Cut Ties
item.description: How to Cut Ties https://youtu.be/pd7tjnVYMzY?t=3880 Look, you’re not going to like this. This isn’t working for me, and I’m sorry but I’m afraid I can’t do it anymore My problem here has been that I like you, and I enjoyed all the

item.title: How to Handle The Ultimatum, "Take It OR Leave It"
item.description: How to Handle The Ultimatum, “Take It OR Leave It” How to respond to “Take it or leave it.” [[Getting to No|No-Oriented Questions]] If I was representing you, you wouldn’t want me to be pushed around like that, would you?

item.title: How to Use Why in Negotiation
item.description: How to Use Why in Negotiation Use it to put people on the defense. [[I Have a Lot of Competitors. (List Them out) Why Me?

item.title: I Have a Lot of Competitors. (List Them out) Why Me?
item.description: I Have a Lot of Competitors. (List Them out) Why Me?

item.title: If You Make Them Feel Understood, You Could Leave Them with Nothing and They Would Still Admire You
item.description: If You Make Them Feel Understood, You Could Leave Them with Nothing and They Would Still Admire You References (References:: YouTube Clip)

item.title: Just Open With "Hi, My Name Is…"
item.description: Just Open With “Hi, My Name Is…” Don’t overdo it or include anything else. It does a great deal to humanize you.

item.title: Labeling
item.description: aliases: Labels, It Sounds Like, It Feels Like, It Looks Like, It Seems Like Labeling Label the situation objectively.

item.title: Make Them Say, "That's Right"
item.description: Make Them Say, “That’s Right” Every day, practice getting the person you’re talking to to say, “That’s Right”

item.title: Never Say "What I'm Hearing Is"
item.description: Never Say “What I’m Hearing Is” It invalidates the person and suggests you care more about yourself and your interpretation than them

item.title: Never Split the Difference
item.description: Never Split the Difference The Main Toolkit [[Getting to No]] [[Labeling]] [[Mirroring]] Everyone wants to say no. Saying no relaxes you and invites critque.

item.title: People Don't Care About Your [[Resume]]. They Care About How Much You Do Right Now, and How Much You Understand the Challenges They Face
item.description: People Don’t Care About Your [[Resume]]. They Care About How Much You Do Right Now, and How Much You Understand the Challenges They Face The minute [[Chris Voss]] demonstrated this (understood the situation and told him they can get his child back by the weekend), the father from Haiti said, “tell me what you want to do.

item.title: [[2022-06-02]] Message to Sena
item.description: [[2022-06-02]] Message to Sena Hey Sena!! Is now not a good time to ask for a huge favor? I completed my website and was wondering if you could test it out at https://yalies.

item.title: [[2021-04-08]] Message to Dante About Housing
item.description: [[2021-04-08]] Message to Dante About Housing Hey Dante, how r u doing? Been talking with the guys and it seems like we got everyone locked in for a doubles-singles switch after the semester and you can be guaranteed a single 👍 would you be available to take room ___ as a single?
